import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './homepage.component.scss' import { animate, motion, useMotionValue } from "framer-motion" import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; // import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring' import ClusterMessage from '../../components/clusterMessage/clusterMessage.component' import Benefit from '../../components/benefit/benefit.component' import Vopsele from '../../components/Vopsele/vopsele.component' import Newsletter from '../../components/Newsletter/newsletter.component' import Parteneri from '../../components/Parteneri/parteneri.component' import Contact from '../../components/Contact/contact.component' import Seap from '../../components/Seap/seap.component' import Footer from '../../components/Footer/footer.component' import livrare from '../../assets/livrare.png' import retur from '../../assets/retur.png' import plata from '../../assets/plata.png' import consiliere from '../../assets/consiliere.png' // import TriangleLogo from '../../assets/triangle.svg' import {ReactComponent as Crane} from '../../assets/crane.svg' import {ReactComponent as AirPlane} from '../../assets/art-send.svg' export default function HomePage() { const containerBenefit = { initial: { opacity: 0 }, actual: { opacity: 1, transition: { when: "beforeChildren", staggerChildren: 0.3 } } } const triangle = { initial:{ x: '50vw', translateX: '-50%', y: '50%', translateY: '-50%', rotateY: 70, }, actual:{ x: '50vw', translateX: '-50%', y: '50%', translateY: '-50%', rotateY: -20, transition:{ ease: "easeIn", duration: 3 } } } const vopsele = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 200 }, actual: { opacity: 1, y: 0 } } const air = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 350, x: '30vw' }, actual: { opacity: 1, x: '55vw', y: -40, transition:{ ease: "easeIn", duration: 3 } } } const [ref, inView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true }) console.log(ref) console.log(inView) return (
{ inView ? : null }
{ inView ? : null }
{ inView ? : null }
{/* */}
) }
